name: dnsimple
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing dnsimple cloud resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`dnsimple` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/terraform-providers/terraform-provider-dnsimple).

token.description: The API v2 token for API operations.

provider.description:
The provider type for the dnsimple package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

token.description: The API v2 token for API operations.

domain.description: The domain to add the record to

domainId.description: The domain ID of the record

priority.description: The priority of the record - only useful for some record types

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering Record resources.
